text: The North Devon Hospice is a charity based in Barnstaple established in 1984 providing palliative care. It operates a Hospice in Barnstaple and palliative home care. It is developing a new base in the grounds of the Holsworthy Medical Centre. In 2014 it won the UK Charity of the Year award. ==References== ==External links== * North Devon Hospice Category:Hospices in England Category:Health in Devon Category:1984 establishments in England
title: North Devon Hospice
